assessments.furtherConsiderationsCurrentSituation: "Joe Bloggs is currently in the community having received a Adjourned - Other Report on the 01/01/2010 for 12 monthsThe end of their sentence is currently unknown. They have no areas linked to harm. Joe Bloggs has been assessed as medium risk to the public.Joe Bloggs will have contact with a child on the protection register or in local authority care.They are quite motivated to address offending behaviour."
